price: 16. Mpe тропа baye bapengwaki, тре baboyaki kondima na bilembo bia biso mpe kondima na mokolo ya suka bakomemama okati ya etumbu.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَلِقَآيِٕ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā waliqāi al-ākhirati fa-ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
